title: Action Adventure Ledge Climbing Animation Pack
description: This is a full set of Action Adventure Game Ledge Climbing Animations
longDescription:
Update V3 - 02 Sep 2024:


  • Added corrner animations that allow for no slidding transitions to turning
  • Added transitions to campus state


Update V2 - 06 June 2024:


  • Added transition animation to campus climb ,ladder, cable cross and pole.
  • Animations are made in UE4 and UE5 skeleton.
  • Root motion and in-place.
  • FBX included


Preview - List of Animations

Preview - Demo 01

Preview - Demo 02


For any updates and requests join our Discord channel:

Main Page - https://discord.gg/Bb8qGgN4cC

Email - contact@motionbeats.studio


This package contains 153 Action Adventure game climbing animations for your project. These quality animations are all fully motion-captured root motion + in-place and made with the UE4 + UE5 Skeletons.


My other assets in the market : https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/profile/Motionbeats+Studio?count=20&sortBy=effectiveDate&sortDir=DESC&start=0


Our studio work: https://www.motionbeats.studio/


Technical Details

Features: Animations

This is an updated version of the original pack of Action Adventure Ledge Climbing Animation Pack in Animations - UE Marketplace (unrealengine.com) , we have rebranded and opened a studio.
technicalDetails:
Rigged to Epic skeleton: Yes (SK_Mannequin UE4 & SK_Mannequin UE5)

IK bones are included: Yes

Number of Animations: 153 (286, both skeletons) (516 with InPlace both skeletons)

Animation types : Root Motion and In-Place version

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Unreal version: 5.0 - 5.4

releaseInfo.releaseNote:
- Minor root adjustments to fit motion matching
-Additinal transitions from and to campus climb
